column2: SELECT sub.AlbumId, Album.Title AS AlbumName, sub.NumTracks, sub.TotalPrice, Artist.Name AS ArtistName FROM ( SELECT TOP # Count(TrackId) AS NumTracks, AlbumId, Sum(UnitPrice) AS TotalPrice FROM chinook.Track GROUP BY AlbumId ORDER BY AlbumId DESC) sub INNER JOIN chinook.Album AS Album ON sub.AlbumId = Album.AlbumId INNER JOIN chinook.Artist AS Artist ON Artist.ArtistId = Album.ArtistId
